title: The New York City Marathon: A 26.2-Mile Fashion Show
description: It’s New York City. No one is here to be subtle. Here’s what some runners wore for the city’s largest block party.
dc:creator: Nadav Gavrielov and Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet

media:content.media:credit: Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York Times
